title: Dr Lee lighting on concentration research method

content.prompt: Dr. Lee is interested in the effect of lighting on peopleâ€™s ability to concentrate. Dr. Lee studies this by manipulating the amount of lighting while participants read and then measuring their scores on a reading comprehension test. Group 1 receives dim light, and group 2 receives bright light. Which of the following research methods is Dr. Lee using?

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
